title: New: Pandit â€“ Believe Me
content:
Having released a sneak peak of his sophomore album in the form of Pillow Talk at the tail end of February, Lance Smith aka Pandit is back with new jam Believe Me.

Playing to his ability to conjure up stunning, ethereal atmospheres, and his dazzling production values, Believe Me embodies truly unique and entirely personal characteristics. With several of his tracks having featured on both the US and UK versions of Skins, and his second album around the corner, 2012 is set to be very exciting for Pandit.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
